services.custom_software_development_des: Designed exactly how you want, so it feels natural for you from the very first click.

services.cloud_infrastructure_services_d: Keep your systems secure, scalable, and ready for whatever your business grows into next.

technologystack.section_subtitle: Explore our technology expertise across frontend, backend, and database solutions. Select a category to learn more the technologies we use.
about.description_company_overview: SpiritBe Technology is a forward-thinking software development company specializing in innovative solutions that drive business growth. Since 2018, we’ve teamed up with companies across the globe to create reliable, scalable tools that support their goals.
about.description_company_passion: Our passion is enhancing your business with the latest software technologies. We create new and friendly user solutions that bring comfort and control to your business tasks. Our core team serves enterprises of all sizes, inspiring us to craft reliable custom solutions.
whycustomsoftware.section_subtitle: We address the unique challenges and priorities of UK and European businesses. Click on any benefit to learn more.
whycustomsoftware.benefit_gdpr_descripti: Strong, compliant security built to meet GDPR and UK regulatory standards, keeping your business data protected at all times.
whycustomsoftware.benefit_scalable_descr: Software that expands with your business, avoiding expensive rebuilds and reducing operational disruption.
whycustomsoftware.benefit_integration_de: Connects smoothly with existing systems to improve workflows and minimise downtime.
whycustomsoftware.benefit_efficiency_des: Reduces manual workload so your team can spend more time on meaningful outcomes.
whycustomsoftware.benefit_innovation_des: Purpose-built features that give your business an edge over off-the-shelf alternatives.
whycustomsoftware.benefit_support_descri: Dedicated local support, fast response times, and proactive maintenance aligned with UK and European business needs.
pricinganddelivery.pricing_description: At SpiritBe, we deliver bespoke software solutions aligned with your unique business vision—whether you come with well-defined specifications or just a rough concept. For clear, documented requirements, we offer fixed-price engagements. For evolving, dynamic scopes, we provide flexible, time-and-materials pricing.
pricinganddelivery.delivery_lifecycle_de: We guide you through every stage of the software journey—from planning, design, and development to hosting, integration, testing, and ongoing maintenance. Our versatile, industry-agnostic approach ensures we quickly understand your domain, creating a tailored solution that optimizes business processes, enhances productivity, and drives down operational costs over time.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services, processes, and how we can help your business succeed.
faq.question1: Do we need to provide a fully-formed project specification?
faq.answer1: We are happy to work with you at any stage of your project, from a rough idea to a detailed plan. We can help you refine your concept, define the requirements, and map out a clear path forward.
faq.question2: How do you help non-technical clients define their project requirements?
faq.answer2: We start by listening to your vision and goals. Then, we use a combination of workshops, user story mapping, and rapid prototyping to help you visualize the final product and gather feedback early and often.
faq.question3: Can you integrate with our existing systems?
faq.answer3: Yes. We'll work with the systems you already rely on, whether that's off-the-shelf tools or in-house platforms, map out how everything fits together, and then carefully connect our software into that setup so your team can keep working without disruption.
faq.question4: Can you work alongside our existing in-house team?
faq.answer4: Yes. We're used to joining existing engineering teams, following your coding standards, using your tools, and taking part in your stand-ups or planning sessions. The goal is to feel like an extension of your team, not a separate supplier.
faq.question5: What does working with you look like week to week?
faq.answer5: You'll have a single point of contact and a shared project board. Each week we agree priorities, build in short cycles, and show you progress in regular demos. You'll always know what's been done, what's in progress, and what's coming next.
